mapper.select: SELECT f.fes_num ,f.m_id ,f.fes_name ,f.fes_photo ,s.sights_num ,s.sights_name ,f.fes_start_date ,f.fes_end_date ,f.fes_detail ,f.fes_web ,f.fes_reg_date ,f.fes_state FROM tb_festival AS f RIGHT OUTER JOIN tb_sights AS s ON f.sights_num = s.sights_num WHERE (f.fes_start_date <= NOW()) and (f.fes_end_date >= NOW());

SELECT f.fes_num ,f.m_id ,f.fes_name ,f.fes_photo ,s.sights_num ,s.sights_name ,f.fes_start_date ,f.fes_end_date ,f.fes_detail ,f.fes_web ,f.fes_reg_date ,f.fes_state FROM tb_festival AS f RIGHT OUTER JOIN tb_sights AS s ON f.sights_num = s.sights_num WHERE (f.fes_start_date > NOW()) and (f.fes_end_date > NOW());

SELECT f.fes_num ,f.m_id ,f.fes_name ,f.fes_photo ,s.sights_num ,s.sights_name ,f.fes_start_date ,f.fes_end_date ,f.fes_detail ,f.fes_web ,f.fes_reg_date ,f.fes_state FROM tb_festival AS f RIGHT OUTER JOIN tb_sights AS s ON f.sights_num = s.sights_num WHERE (f.fes_start_date < NOW()) and (f.fes_end_date < NOW());
SELECT fes_num ,m_id ,fes_name ,fes_photo ,fes_start_date ,fes_end_date ,fes_detail ,fes_web ,fes_reg_date ,fes_state FROM tb_festival WHERE fes_num = #{fesNum};
